did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Recordings of the Virginia House of Delegates Sessions, 1981-?

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This is an artificial accession created for the use copies of the recordings of the House of Delegates, the originals are filed under the accession numbers they were given upon their reciept.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:
This collection is arranged chronologically by the first date listed.

did.unittitle: 1982 Jan 13-16, 18 - House and Governor's Speech (3 discs).
1982 Feb 20 - House Log, HB 461, HB 441, HB 438 ( 2 discs).
1982 Feb 20 - House Log, HJR p.23-45, SJR 23, HLR 16, HB 795, HJR 78 (2 discs).
1982 Feb 23-25; Mar 2-4 - Health and Welfare (2 discs).
1983 Jan 19, 26; Feb 2 - Privileges and Elections (2 disks).
1983 Jan 27; Feb 1 - Courts of Justice (3 discs).
1983 Feb 16, 22 - General Laws and Courts of Justice (3 discs).
1984 Jan 17 - House, CIB, Courts of Justice (46:44).
1984 Jan 18, 25; Feb 1, 8 - Privileges and Elections (2 discs).
1984 Jan 26 - General Assembly; Courts of Justice (50:47).
1984 Feb 9 - Rules, Courts of Justice (2 discs).
1984 Feb 22, 27, 29 - General Laws, Privileges and Elections (3 discs).
1984 Feb 23, 24, 28; Mar 1 - Courts of Justice - part 2, part 1 (3 discs).
